trans-unit.source: Represents audio input that is associated with a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult" />.
trans-unit.target: Stellt eine Audioeingabe dar, die mit einem <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult" /> zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: A speech recognizer generates information about the audio input as part of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Eine von der Spracherkennung generiert Informationen zu den Audioeingabe als Teil der Erkennungsvorgang.

trans-unit.source: To access the recognized audio, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: Verwenden Sie den Zugriff auf den erkannten Audio der <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> Eigenschaft oder die <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> Methode der <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.

trans-unit.source: A recognition result can be produced by the following events and methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes:
trans-unit.target: Ein Erkennungsergebnis kann erstellt werden, durch die folgenden Ereignisse und Methoden des der <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> und <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> Klassen:

trans-unit.source: Events:
trans-unit.target: Ereignisse:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=nameWithType> und <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=nameWithType> und <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> und <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> und <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Methods:
trans-unit.target: Methoden:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> und <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> und <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: A recognition result produced by emulated speech recognition does not contain recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Eine von "emuliert" Spracherkennung erstellte Recognition Ergebnis enth√§lt keine bekannten Audio.

trans-unit.source: For such a recognition result, its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property returns `null` and its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: F√ºr solche Recognition Ergebnis seine <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> -Eigenschaft gibt `null` und seine <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> Methode l√∂st eine Ausnahme aus.

trans-unit.source: For more information about emulated speech recognition, see the `EmulateRecognize` and `EmulateRecognizeAsync` methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: Weitere Informationen zu "emuliert" Spracherkennung, finden Sie unter der `EmulateRecognize` und `EmulateRecognizeAsync` Methoden die <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> und <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> Klassen.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and outputs to the console information about the recognized audio that is associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: Das folgende Beispiel verarbeitet die <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType>, oder <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> Ereignis und Ausgaben an die Konsole Informationen √ºber die erkannten Audiodatei, die das Erkennungsergebnis zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Ruft die Position im Eingabeaudiostream f√ºr den Anfang des erkannten Audios ab.

trans-unit.source: The location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Die Position im Eingabeaudiostream f√ºr den Anfang des erkannten Audios.

trans-unit.source: This property references the position at the beginning of the recognized phrase in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Diese Eigenschaft verweist auf die Position am Anfang des dem erkannten Ausdruck in das Eingabeger√§t generierten Audiostream.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the `RecognizerAudioPosition` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> classes reference the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Im Gegensatz dazu, die `RecognizerAudioPosition` Eigenschaft von der <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> und <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> Klassen verweisen, die Erkennung Position innerhalb der Audioeingabe.

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Diese Positionen k√∂nnen unterschiedlich sein.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter [mit Spracherkennung Recognition Ereignissen](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> -Eigenschaft ruft die Systemzeit zu Beginn der Erkennungsvorgang ab.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and outputs to the console information about the recognized audio that is associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: Das folgende Beispiel verarbeitet die <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> oder <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> Ereignis und Ausgaben an die Konsole Informationen √ºber die erkannten Audiodatei, die das Erkennungsergebnis zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: Gets the duration of the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Ruft die Dauer des Eingabeaudiostreams f√ºr das erkannte Audio ab.

trans-unit.source: The duration within the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Die Dauer innerhalb des Eingabeaudiostreams f√ºr das erkannte Audio.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and outputs to the console information about the recognized audio that is associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: Das folgende Beispiel verarbeitet die <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> oder <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> Ereignis und Ausgaben an die Konsole Informationen √ºber die erkannten Audiodatei, die das Erkennungsergebnis zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the audio processed by a recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Ruft das Audioformat ab, das von einem Erkennungsmodul verarbeitet wird.

trans-unit.source: The format of the audio processed by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Das Format f√ºr das Audio-Element, dass von der Spracherkennung verarbeitet wird.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and outputs to the console information about the recognized audio that is associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: Das folgende Beispiel verarbeitet die <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> oder <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> Ereignis und Ausgaben an die Konsole Informationen √ºber die erkannten Audiodatei, die das Erkennungsergebnis zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: The starting point of the audio data to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Der Anfangspunkt der Audiodaten, die zur√ºckgegeben werden sollen.

trans-unit.source: The length of the segment to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Die L√§nge des Segments, das zur√ºckgegeben werden soll.

trans-unit.source: Selects and returns a section of the current recognized audio as binary data.
trans-unit.target: W√§hlt aus und gibt einen Abschnitt des aktuellen erkannten Audio als Bin√§rdaten zur√ºck.

trans-unit.source: Returns a subsection of the recognized audio, as defined by <paramref name="audioPosition" /> and <paramref name="duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Gibt einen Unterabschnitt des erkannten Audio zur√ºck, wie durch <paramref name="audioPosition" /> und <paramref name="duration" /> definiert.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a speech recognition grammar for name input, adds a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event, and loads the grammar into an in-process speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Das folgende Beispiel erstellt eine Spracherkennung Recognition Grammatik f√ºr die Namenseingabe, f√ºgt ein Handler f√ºr das <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> -Ereignis und die Grammatik in einer in-Process-Spracherkennung geladen.

trans-unit.source: Then it writes the audio information for the name portion of the input to an audio file.
trans-unit.target: Er schreibt dann die Informationen f√ºr den Namensteil der Eingabe eine Audiodatei.

trans-unit.source: The audio file is used as input to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object, which speaks a phrase that includes the recorded audio.
trans-unit.target: Die Audiodatei dient als Eingabe f√ºr eine <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> -Objekt, das einen Ausdruck spricht, die Audioaufnahmen enth√§lt.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="audioPosition" /> and <paramref name="duration" /> define a segment of audio outside the range of the current segment.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="audioPosition" /> und <paramref name="duration" /> definieren ein Audio-Segment au√üerhalb des Bereichs des aktuellen Segments.

trans-unit.source: The current recognized audio contains no data.
trans-unit.target: Das aktuelle erkannte Audiodatei enth√§lt keine Daten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Ruft die Systemzeit zu Beginn des Erkennungsvorgangs ab.

trans-unit.source: The system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Die Systemzeit am Anfang des Erkennungsvorgangs.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation, which can be useful for latency and performance calculations.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> Eigenschaft ruft die Systemzeit zu Beginn der Erkennungsvorgang, Latenz und Leistung von Berechnungen hilfreich sein kann.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A> property gets the location in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A> Eigenschaft ruft den Speicherort in das Eingabeger√§t generierten Audiostream ab.

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and outputs to the console information about the recognized audio that is associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: Das folgende Beispiel verarbeitet die <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> oder <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=nameWithType> Ereignis und Ausgaben an die Konsole Informationen √ºber die erkannten Audiodatei, die das Erkennungsergebnis zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: Der Stream, der die Audiodaten empf√§ngt.

trans-unit.source: Writes the entire audio to a stream as raw data.
trans-unit.target: Schreibt das gesamte Audio als Rohdaten in einen Stream.

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in binary form.
trans-unit.target: Audio Daten geschrieben `outputStream` in bin√§rer Form.

trans-unit.source: No header information is included.
trans-unit.target: Keine Headerinformationen ist enthalten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> method uses the Wave format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> -Methode verwendet das Wave-Format, aber den Wave-Header nicht einschlie√üt.

trans-unit.source: To include the Wave header, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Um den Wave-Header einzuschlie√üen, verwenden die <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A> Methode.

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: Der Stream, der die Audiodaten empf√§ngt.

trans-unit.source: Writes audio to a stream in Wave format.
trans-unit.target: Schreibt Audio in einen Stream im Waveformat.

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in Wave format, which includes a resource interchange file format (RIFF) header.
trans-unit.target: Audio Daten geschrieben `outputStream` Wave-Format, darunter eine Ressource Interchange Format (RIFF) Dateiheader.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> method uses the same binary format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> -Methode verwendet das gleiche bin√§re Format, aber den Wave-Header nicht einschlie√üt.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a speech recognition grammar for name input, adds a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event, and loads the grammar into an in-process speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Das folgende Beispiel erstellt eine Spracherkennung Recognition Grammatik f√ºr die Namenseingabe, f√ºgt ein Handler f√ºr das <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> -Ereignis und die Grammatik in einer in-Process-Spracherkennung geladen.

trans-unit.source: Then it writes the audio information for the name portion of the input to an audio file.
trans-unit.target: Er schreibt dann die Informationen f√ºr den Namensteil der Eingabe eine Audiodatei.

trans-unit.source: The audio file is used as input to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object, which speaks a phrase that includes the recorded audio.
trans-unit.target: Die Audiodatei dient als Eingabe f√ºr eine <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> -Objekt, das einen Ausdruck spricht, die Audioaufnahmen enth√§lt.
